location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sheet No. II MAP OF SHATT-AL-'ARAB & BAHMANSHIR INCLUDING MUHAMMAREH AND 'ABBADAN I. MAP No. 4'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 270 x 300mm, on a sheet 400 x 440mm

mods.abstract: Map depicting the water channels of the Shatt al Arab and Bahmanshir River near Muhammareh [Khorramshahr] and 'Abbadan [Ābādān] Island. The map indicates settlements, hydrology, and boundaries. The map features an additional line marked in green coloured ink to indicate the boundary proposed by HM Government.
